ygData.subject: RE: Brell Serilis
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would love to, but I already have plans for that time tonight.  But I will look around for you all tomorrow, I guess. Btw, are they also still processing
ygData.messageBody:
>In order to create the guild, I need at least nine people to join me in
>the EQ chat tonight to go through the automated guild creation process.
>I'll arbitrarily ask that people show up at 10:30 EST in the Brell
>Serilis chat room. I'll then create a "Sisters of Erollisi" chat room
>which we will move to, and the automated guild creation process will
>begin. I will then add players within the game as you send me tells.

I would love to, but I already have plans for that time tonight. But I will
look around for you all tomorrow, I guess.
Btw, are they also still processing guilds via email, or do they all have to be
made in a chat room like that? Do you know?

>I have a 6th level high-elf enchanter on Brell named Luna.

I'll look for you. =)






Melissa
ICQ#23767351
"If Moses had been Pagan, there would have been drummers and dancers around the burning bush."
